publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3103 Chris Ballance: Human Rights Observers in Israel and Palestine—That the Parliament welcomes the Ecumenical Accompaniment Programme of the World Council of Churches which arranges for human rights observers to work in Israel and Palestine and encourages Her Majesty’s Government to work with intergovernmental organisations to establish a human rights observation force in the occupied territories and to press for an end to the occupation in a just and peaceful solution to the conflict on the basis of UN resolutions and the international rule of law. Supported by: Campbell Martin*, Robin Harper*, Ms Rosemary Byrne* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S2M-3103 Human Rights Observers in Israel and Palestine (lodged on 18 July 2005) Mark Ballard*, Dennis Canavan*, Shiona Baird*, Rosie Kane*, Linda Fabiani*
S2M-3103 Human Rights Observers in Israel and Palestine (lodged on 18 July 2005) Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-3103 Human Rights Observers in Israel and Palestine (lodged on 18 July 2005) Tommy Sheridan*, Eleanor Scott*
